page.title: 01THE HETTON AREA
page.content: The area lies close to the North Sea Coast on the South_Western perimeter of the Borough of Sunderland. The village of Hetton_Le_Hole dates back to Anglo_Saxon times{(Heppedune). Our industrial history is linked with coal. Hetton gained fame through the railway which linked its colliery with the Wear at Sunderland.The original wagon_way was constructed by{George {Stephenson}in 1819. New industry has developed. One example of this is the industrial estate which lies on the site of the former Hetton Lyons Colliery. Although Hetton is an Industrial Area there is,{agricultural}land around. The Moorsley and East Rainton area consists of open country. Private and Council houses have improved. The residents are close to several{attractive towns}and{cities.
